exceptions.exn: In environment P : Z -> Set p : nat H_ind : forall n : Z, (forall m : Z, lt_absZ m n -> P m) -> P n H_and : and_recZ p P n : nat H_le : n <= S p Unable to unify "P ?M1376" with "and_set_set_set (P (pos n)) (P (neg n))".
In environment P : Z -> Set p : nat H_ind : forall n : Z, (forall m : Z, lt_absZ m n -> P m) -> P n H_and : and_recZ p P n : nat H_le : n <= S p Unable to unify "n <= S p" with "S n <= S p".

original: intros P p H_ind H_and. intros n H_le. apply H_ind. intros m H_lt. apply H_and. apply le_S_n. apply H_le.
